sense.def:
To resort to methods that one disapproves of
pomeni, da nekdo uporabi metode, s katerimi se ne strinja, ker ne vidi druge poti do zastavljenega cilja.

seg.quote: They had not so far chosen to resort to violence.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj naredimo
as a last resort
, hočemo na ta način rešiti neko težavo, pri kateri so odpovedali vsi drugi postopki reševanja.

seg.quote: As a last resort he went to the British Library.

sense.def:
A resort
je kraj, kamor hodi na počitnice veliko ljudi.
